NK103(pe)002:1: // ma n+da la s+ya d+h+aa tu ti sma ////
NK103(pe)002:4: sarba d+harma man+da la b+y+aa ka ra na n+aa ma /
NK103(pe)002:6: gzhi lam 'bras bu'i chos thams cad ye rdzogs gzhi
NK103(pe)002:7: la sogs pa dkyil 'khor bdun du sgro skur med
NK103(pe)002:8: par lung bstan pa zhes bya ba //
NK103(pe)002:9: legs pa'i bdag nyid pas dpal spyod yul yongs su
NK103(pe)002:10: dag pas kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo
NK103(pe)002:11: // dus gdod ma nas byang chub snying po'i dal du gnas pa la //
NK103(pe)002:12: de nyid ma rig cing bdag gzhan du kha'khrul rten
NK103(pe)002:13: 'brel bcu ga nyis su 'khor rnam kapar rtog pas
NK103(pe)002:14: snod bcud du rigs drug tu ga'khyams //
NK103(pe)002:15: gtan tshigs dpe lung gis brgyud pa dang man ngag gis dngos su rgyal ba'i thugs rjes sprad //
NK103(pe)002:16: bas nges don gyi snying po rang la shar bas 'dud //
NK103(pe)002:17: bcos ma'am rnal ma'i sgo nas don gyi dbang bskur bar byed la //
NK103(pe)002:18: de yi rten du dkyil 'khor ye nas rang la gnas so //
NK103(pe)002:19: mtshon byed rtags su bkod pas don rang la gnas pa mtshon //
NK103(pe)002:20: pa'i thabs bka' klong dgu bam po nyi khri la
NK103(pe)002:21: brten te de dag don bsdus la tshig tu dgod
NK103(pe)002:22: do // chos kun gyi ngo bo rang bzhin byang rnam pa chub sems //
NK103(pe)002:23: mtshan nyid don gyi snying po ma bcos pa'i dal rang gsal ba'i //
NK103(pe)002:24: lhun grub gsum dbyer med par ye nas don gyis 'khor 'das kun rdzogs pas //
NK103(pe)002:25: kun nas bzlums par gnas pa'i dal zhes bya ba yin no //
NK103(pe)002:26: 'gro 'dus rdo rje dbyings kyi dal nyid la //
NK103(pe)002:27: phyi nang gsang bar gsum du rgyud las gsungs pa ste //
NK103(pe)002:28: phyi yi dal 'byung ba 'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gyis gnas pa ni //
NK103(pe)002:29: rang rig pa'i yon tan lhun gyis grub pas ma 'gags pa las //
NK103(pe)002:30: de'i gzugs brnyan don mtshon pa cir yang shar //
NK103(pe)002:31: dngos po kun 'byung yang kun byang chub snying por rdzogs des na chos kun de nyid tu grol //
NK103(pe)002:32: brgyud nas mtshon pas lhag pa'i las so so la sbyor ba ni //
NK103(pe)002:33: tshon lnga re re yang lnga lnga nyi shu rtsa lnga yis //
NK103(pe)002:34: theg pa so so'i bka' bzhin du dgod pa lhag pa gzugs brnyan gyi dal dgod //
NK103(pe)002:35: pa yang rdo rje dbyings kyi lha bcu phrag gsum dang bdun ni rigs lnga /
NK103(pe)002:37: bskal bzang gi sems dpa' chen po bcu drug /
NK103(pe)002:39: sgo ba bzhi las bzhi blangs pa ni //
NK103(pe)002:40: 'og min gyi longs spyod rdzogs pa'i dal 'dra ba'i tshul //
NK103(pe)002:41: du ste mtshon pa'i brda yis sbyar ba sngags phyi nang gi dal gang yang rung ba //
NK103(pe)002:42: thun mong dang khyad par 'jug pa'i rten //
NK103(pe)002:43: dal gtso bo dbus su bkod cing 'khor mtha' nas bskor bar bstan pa'o //
NK103(pe)002:44: nang lus la gnas pa'i snod rtsa bcud thig le rnams //
NK103(pe)002:45: rlung gi nus pas so sor bzhag pa yang //
NK103(pe)002:46: phyi lte ba sprul pa rtsa 'dab drug cu'am rtsa bzhi /
NK103(pe)002:47: thig le yi ge'i dbyibs kyang de dang mnyam par ldan //
NK103(pe)002:48: nang na bzhi bar na brgyad kyi shi ra rtsa ldan //
NK103(pe)002:49: de dag gi dbus na thung ngu'i a gnas pa //
NK103(pe)002:50: de lus zungs bcud kyi rlung dang 'brel cing bde ba skyed pa'i rten gzhir gnas so //
NK103(pe)002:51: snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo dag la rtsa brgyad de //
NK103(pe)002:52: chos nyid kyi gsum yon tan dang ye shes kyi re re dang //
NK103(pe)002:53: rang rgyud kyi rtsa gsum po dag la 'gro ba rigs drug gi chos su tri /
NK103(pe)002:56: sa bon drug dang chos sku /
NK103(pe)002:59: dbus na 'khor 'das dbyer med du lhun gyis grub pa'i snying po h'u //
NK103(pe)002:60: yon tan gyi gcig ni blo rmugs gnyid dang bag chags kyi rten //
NK103(pe)002:61: dbus dngas ma lnga 'dus ni srog 'dzin don gyi
NK103(pe)002:62: rlung ste snying gi dwangs ma'i dwangs ma a thung
NK103(pe)002:63: la brten nas mi rgyu ba srog dbang dang mnyam
NK103(pe)002:64: du gnas / tshe'i dus byed tsam na dwangs ma
NK103(pe)002:65: dang bcas nas rgyu ba de rnam par shes pa
NK103(pe)002:66: du gnas / rten // yin pas chos sku //
NK103(pe)002:67: gsal la mi rtog gnas pa'i gzhi yin pas chos sku dang sbyar ro //
NK103(pe)002:68: mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo rtsa 'dab lnga phrag gnyis dang drug yod //
NK103(pe)002:69: de'i rtsa mdud 'khyil pa gsung gi sa bon am
NK103(pe)002:70: dang rtsa 'dab la dbyangs yig bcu drug dang bcas
NK103(pe)002:71: // 'dod yon lnga la longs spyod pa yi rten
NK103(pe)002:72: gyi rtsar 'brel te de'i rang bzhin 'od gsal gnas
NK103(pe)002:73: pa'i rten nam snying por bsdus pas longs spyod du
NK103(pe)002:74: // sbyar ro // klad pa bde chen rtsa 'dab
NK103(pe)002:75: bcu phrag gsum dang gnyis te so gnyis sgra yig
NK103(pe)002:77: dbus na rtsa mdud spyi'u tshugs bde ba skyed pas
NK103(pe)002:78: ma yig ste ham mgo thur du bstan pas mtshon
NK103(pe)002:79: pa // lus bde bas khyab pa'i bcud thig le can gyis lus kun bde ba skyed //
NK103(pe)002:83: lte ba sprul pa'i gsum rtsa dbu mas 'brel pa'i gzhi ma'o //
NK103(pe)002:84: lte ba'i sor bzhi'i 'og gsang ba'i mtshams nas me yi gzhi //
NK103(pe)002:85: gru gsum dkyil na gtum mo'am drag mo'i gzugs //
NK103(pe)002:86: de'i kha dog dmar ser ram yig ngad tsha ba //
NK103(pe)002:87: smig sreg 'bar 'phro'i las byed pa yin //
NK103(pe)002:88: sgrom mdo mnam kha rlung gi gzhi ni //
NK103(pe)002:89: gzhu'i dbyibs te la zla gam yang na 'og rlung
NK103(pe)002:90: dwangs snyigs 'byed pa dang 'og rlung 'ching ba ste
NK103(pe)002:91: sdom ba'i rwa // rlung gi pa dan dang bcas pa ni bde ba bskul ba'i rkyen gyis //
NK103(pe)002:92: bde ba gsal dbugs phyir 'ded nang du sdud cing bshang gci 'thor ba yin //
NK103(pe)002:93: rtsa ba'i 'khor lo bzhi la me rlung gi rkyen gnyis kyis //
NK103(pe)002:94: bskul zhing lus kyi bcud smin par byed pa //
NK103(pe)002:95: nang na phung po ye gnas grub //
NK103(pe)002:96: pas nang gi dal te steng sgo ye shes dgug
NK103(pe)002:97: pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa 'jug pa'i rten du
NK103(pe)002:98: rung ba'o // gsang ba'i dal ni dbang po rdo rje'i yul pad+ma dang //
NK103(pe)002:99: rnam par shes pa ste 'og sgo khams gsum rol pa las //
NK103(pe)002:100: 'dod chags can la lhun gnas kyi don mtshon pa ni //
NK103(pe)002:101: sna tshogs mdud pa zlum po sgo gru bzhi /
NK103(pe)002:103: phyi khyams gru gsum ste las bzhi dbyibs dang ldan pa'i pad+ma de //
NK103(pe)002:108: rigs bzhi'i d+he wa lha mo yum mtshan ldan la //
NK103(pe)002:112: gzhib pa la sogs pa rol pa'i ka ra na yi bstan bcos kyis brgyan //
NK103(pe)002:113: rgan po byis pa ma ning dge slong min yul
NK103(pe)002:114: gyi rten la gsang ba dang brda yi ngag gis
NK103(pe)002:115: ming // gsang ba ste des snying po'i dal gyi don la gnas par nus so //
NK103(pe)002:116: gnyis pa rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i dal ni //
NK103(pe)002:117: thams cad la rgyas 'debs pas phyag rgya chen po rtsol ba med par lhun gyis grub ste //
NK103(pe)002:118: de la 'khor mtha' dang gtso bo dbus na gnas pa med pa yangs pa'i rang bzhin la //
NK103(pe)002:119: rnam shes tshogs drug dang de'i yul drug ni ma
NK103(pe)002:120: bcos pa ye shes kyi rol par shar ba ni
NK103(pe)002:121: // kha dog bkra zhing dbyibs gsal ba'i gzugs 1dang
NK103(pe)002:122: brjod pa dang bral ba nyid zin ma zin gnyis
NK103(pe)002:124: dngos po bral te rang bzhin med pa nyid zhim
NK103(pe)002:125: pa dang mi zhim pa dang de las gzhan pa'i
NK103(pe)002:126: dri // mu kha ro drug ma bcos pa'i thig
NK103(pe)002:127: le dbyings las shar kyang de nyid kyi ngang 1
NK103(pe)002:128: dri // // reg bya sna tshogs thig le las
NK103(pe)002:129: shar bas dbyings nyid 'dus pa b+ha ga'i klong 1
NK103(pe)002:130: dri // // // dran rig sna tshogs de nyid
NK103(pe)002:131: las shar cing de nyid la kun 'dus 11pa'i chos
NK103(pe)002:132: dri // // // so // bde 11 chen 11dkyil 'khor te grangs ni rtsa ba drug go //
NK103(pe)002:133: ma bcos pa ji bzhin mngon sum du shar ba kho na bas //
NK103(pe)002:134: drug tu snang yang bde ba chen de dag po phyogs ris med pa gcig gi ngang //
NK103(pe)002:135: de dag tu zhugs shing rtogs na ye shes mu mtha' med par 'jug /
NK103(pe)002:136: bskyed pa'am bris pa min pas 'di ni rang bzhin gyis ma bcos pa'i dkyil 'khor yin //
NK103(pe)002:137: kyang ma rtogs na mi grol bas rna brgyud kyi man ngag 'di la de bzhin nan tan bya'o //
NK103(pe)002:138: rang bzhin rnam dag de ni man+da'i sgras snying po 'am nying khu'am dkyil lta bu'i don nyid de //
NK103(pe)002:139: don la 'byung 'jug med pa'i ngang la gnas pas //
NK103(pe)002:140: ngo bo nyid kyis 'brel phyir snying po de nges
NK103(pe)002:141: par longs te la'i sgra ni len cing 'dzin pa
NK103(pe)002:142: la 'jug / chos thams cad kun nas byang chub sems su bzlums pa'i phyir na dkyil 'khor ro //
NK103(pe)002:143: don de la gtso bo bzang po dbus na gnas pa dang //
NK103(pe)002:144: mtha' na 'khor ngan pa gnas pa'i bzang ngan med la //
NK103(pe)002:145: snying po spros bral dbus gnas pa'i dkyil dang //
NK103(pe)002:146: spros pa'i chos kyis mtha' nas bskor ba dang bral ba ni srog go //
NK103(pe)002:147: 'khor ba dang 'das pa dang phyi snod dang nang bcud la sogs pa chos thams cad //
NK103(pe)002:148: rang bzhin spros bral mtshan nyid rang rig rnam pa sgyu mar gdod nas dag /
NK103(pe)002:149: pas de gsum mtshon tshul nas ma 'dres la ngo
NK103(pe)002:150: bo tha dad med par yongs su rdzogs pa lhun
NK103(pe)002:151: gyis grub pa'i // bde ba chen po'i ngang du de dag thams cad mnyam pas gdeng ngo //
NK103(pe)002:152: 'gro 'dul rdo rje dbyings kyi dal la phyi gzugs brnyan nang rtsa gnas gsang ba yum gyi mkha' //
NK103(pe)002:153: rang rang gi nges pa'i tshig ni de dag thun mong du //
NK103(pe)002:154: thabs sna tshogs kyis brgyud nas ston pa'i lung rnams su /
NK103(pe)002:156: pa des ni dal de yi bya ba'i thabs kyi yan lag bcu rdzogs //
NK103(pe)002:158: sa gzhi snyoms dang tshad thig dang //
NK103(pe)002:159: tshon dang bri ba rnam pa dang //
NK103(pe)002:160: rab gnas sbyin sreg 'jug pa dang //
NK103(pe)002:161: yon tan rnam bcus rgyas shes bya //
NK103(pe)002:162: zhes pas rang bzhin rnam dag dkyil 'khor gyi //
NK103(pe)002:163: yan lag bcu nges par rdzogs par bstan pa yang gang zhe na //
NK103(pe)002:165: gzhi dang rang mtshan bslang dbang dang //
NK103(pe)002:166: sbyang sbyin bsrung dang gzung bar ni //
NK103(pe)002:167: dang po'i nying lag nyid du bshad //
NK103(pe)002:169: chos thams cad ye nas chos nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis gzhi chen po de la //
NK103(pe)002:170: spyir ni 'khor 'das thams cad bzang ngan blang dor med par mnyam //
NK103(pe)002:172: shes pa'i rgyud snang ba dang myong ba dang rig pas gsum byang chub sems su grol //
NK103(pe)002:173: chos thams cad rang dbang du gnas pas gdod nas yon tan thob pas bslang ba //
NK103(pe)002:174: chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems las gzhan med
NK103(pe)002:175: par grol bas phyogs med kyi rang dbang du 'dus
NK103(pe)002:176: // pa ni dbang du bya ba /
NK103(pe)002:177: phyogs 'dzin gyi rtog pa rnam par dag pa ni sbyang ba'o //
NK103(pe)002:178: che ba'i yon tan kun gyi dngos gzhi'i bdag nyid byin gyis brlab pa'o //
NK103(pe)002:179: 'khrul pa'i mtshan ma grol bar rang la lhun grub
NK103(pe)002:180: tu gnas pas phyi nang don gyi bar chod dang
NK103(pe)002:182: phyogs ris med pa'i bde ba dang dus gsum du
NK103(pe)002:183: mi 'bral ba'i gzungs su ye nas gnas pa ni
NK103(pe)002:184: gzung ba'o // chos dbyings rgya chad phyogs lhung dang bral ba nyid nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i //
NK103(pe)002:185: don la dus gsum du 'gyur ba med cing phyogs
NK103(pe)002:186: su ma lhungs pas drang por gnas pa ni tshad
NK103(pe)002:187: do // nam mkha' rang bzhin spros pa dang bral
NK103(pe)002:188: ba'i ngang du brtan pa ni gnas thigs gzhi ye
NK103(pe)002:189: shes kyi rang 'od rnam pa sgyu ma rdo rje
NK103(pe)002:191: bar thig ni mtshan nyid rang rig ye shes la //
NK103(pe)002:192: cir yang ma grub pas sgro 'dogs dang 1thams cad
NK103(pe)002:193: du 'char bas skur 'debs dang bral 11bas lhun grub
NK103(pe)002:194: gsum du drang por nges pas thig go //
NK103(pe)002:195: snang srid thams cad rang byung gi ye shes mtshon
NK103(pe)002:196: par byed pa'i thabs su mu mtha' cir yang gsal
NK103(pe)002:198: spros pa thams cad dang bral bas zlum po chos
NK103(pe)002:199: kun khyab pas gru bzhi rnam rtog rang dbang du
NK103(pe)002:201: mu matha'i phyogs ris lhun grub phyogs med du 'joms par mdzad pa gru gsum dang bzhi ru mdzes //
NK103(pe)002:202: yul med rang gsal de rtogs bas sku gsum ma
NK103(pe)002:203: 'dres la yongs su rdzogs par rtogs pas bkra gsal
NK103(pe)002:204: che // ste rang bzhin rnam dag gi dkyil 'khor chen por bris pa'o //
NK103(pe)002:205: snang ba gzugs grag pa sgra tshor ba dri myong ba ro reg pa reg bya rnams ni //
NK103(pe)002:206: rnam shes rten pas sku yi dkyil 'khor dgod pa yin //
NK103(pe)002:207: zin ma zin gnyis ka las byung ba'i sgra skad
NK103(pe)002:208: rab 'bring ni don mtshon cing brda sprod pa gsunga
NK103(pe)002:209: gi dal yin // shes bya kun 'dus pa'i phyogs
NK103(pe)002:210: med ni bde ba chen po yin pas thugs kyi
NK103(pe)002:211: dkyil 'khor te rnam pa dgod pa'o //
NK103(pe)002:212: chos thams cad ye nas rang byung gi ye shes byang chub kyi sems //
NK103(pe)002:213: su gnas pa la lha ye shes pa che ba'i
NK103(pe)002:214: yon tan thams cad rdzogs par grub pa ni rab
NK103(pe)002:215: tu gnas // pa la 'khor 'das ma lus pa'i
NK103(pe)002:216: mnga' thang thig le chen po'i klong du 'ub pas
NK103(pe)002:217: tu gnas // phul ba yin // rtogs pa'i ye shes rang gsal ba'i ram yig gi mes //
NK103(pe)002:218: mun pa ma rig pa dang 'khrul pa'i rnam rtog gi bud shing bsregs //
NK103(pe)002:219: dngos po dang stong pa'i bsreg rdzas dang yam shing gis //
NK103(pe)002:220: stong pa nyid kyi bde khaba chen po'i mchod pas kame lha ni gamnyes pa ni sbyin sreg go //
NK103(pe)002:222: dbang phyug 'jug dang bzod par gsol //
NK103(pe)002:223: khrus dgab dri dang lus dbul dang //
NK103(pe)002:224: bgegs bskrad lhar brlab dam tshig sbyin //
NK103(pe)002:225: de nyid dbog dang chu nan bya //
NK103(pe)002:226: bsgrag dang rin chen dor ba dang //
NK103(pe)002:227: lha dbab pa dang nan tan dang //
NK103(pe)002:228: mig dbye da la legs bstan dang //
NK103(pe)002:229: tshogs mchog yon dang rnam bco brgyad //
NK103(pe)002:230: ces pas che ba'i yon tan gyi mnga' dbang rdzogs
NK103(pe)002:231: te rgyal ba dang dbyer med du gyur pas bdag
NK103(pe)002:232: nyid zhugs // pa ste dbang phyug 'jug pa'o //
NK103(pe)002:233: phyogs med kyi don gyis gang dang mi 'gal ba ni bzod par gsol ba chen po'o //
NK103(pe)002:234: rig pa nyid ye nas 'khrul pa rnam par dag pa ni ye shes chen po'i khrus so //
NK103(pe)002:235: bag chags sna tshogs kyi mig dar rang ka mar chags pas g.yogs //
NK103(pe)002:236: thos bsam shes rab gnyis kyis don la 'jug pa'i sgor drangs te //
NK103(pe)002:237: lhun gnas kyi don la rtogs goms kyis gnas par spro ba bskyed dam mi bskyed dri ba'o //
NK103(pe)002:238: bu yis 'jug cing spro par khas blangs pa ni lan //
NK103(pe)002:239: tha mal pa'i sgo gsum byang sems kyi ngang du stob //
NK103(pe)002:240: pa ni lus dbul ba rnam rtog rang byung ye shes kyi ngang du bsgral //
NK103(pe)002:241: ba ni bgegs bskrad pa rang rig skye ba med pa ni ngang gi lha //
NK103(pe)002:243: sgo gsum mnyam grol rtogs pa'i don las mi 'da' ba'i dam tshig sbyin cing dbog pa'o //
NK103(pe)002:244: gnas lugs kyi don rig pa'i ngang du rgyun chags pa ni chu nan du gnas so //
NK103(pe)002:245: mkhyen pa'i ye shes yul med rang gsal gyi ngang du bsgrags //
NK103(pe)002:246: gzhi dad pa grogs brtson 'grus brtse gdung dam tshig dang ldan pa ni rin chen dor ba //
NK103(pe)002:247: chu bo bzhi rdzogs bla mas yul med rang gsal
NK103(pe)002:248: mngon du phab pa ni lha dbab pa ste nan
NK103(pe)002:249: tan du gnas // shes bya kun mkhyen yul med
NK103(pe)002:250: rang gsal du shes pa'i shes rab ni mig phye
NK103(pe)002:251: tan du gnas // ba // byang chub snying pos
NK103(pe)002:252: 'i bcud longs pas man+dala mthong ba ni dal bstan
NK103(pe)002:253: tan du gnas // ba // pa'o // skyon yon
NK103(pe)002:254: thams cad bral bas yon gyi mchog gis mnyes par
NK103(pe)002:255: tan du gnas // ba // pa'o // phul ba'o
NK103(pe)002:256: // dal du 'jug pa'i yan lag bco brgyad dang
NK103(pe)002:257: bkod pa dal gyi cho ga'i yan lag bcu po
NK103(pe)002:258: tan du gnas // ba // pa'o // phul ba'o
NK103(pe)002:259: // dag / a ti'i thabs chen gcig gis yon
NK103(pe)002:260: tan thams cad rdzogs par gnas pa //
NK103(pe)002:261: des na lhag ma med par rang la gnas pas ni rdzogs pa che zhe'o //
NK103(pe)002:262: rnal 'byor rtogs goms kyi nyams la bde bar gnas par 'dod na //
NK103(pe)002:263: de la gsal byed rin chen 'bar ba'i dal dgod de //
NK103(pe)002:264: yul shes rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bas 'khrul gzhi
NK103(pe)002:265: 'khor ba nus pa can 'di rang rig pa la
NK103(pe)002:266: // kun rdzogs par yul drug bde chen gyi dkyil
NK103(pe)002:267: 'khor drug lus la yod pa la dgod ces bya
NK103(pe)002:268: // // rtsol brgyad zhen drug rtag chad gnyis kyis 'gro 'phrang gnas kyis ded la gcad do //
NK103(pe)002:269: nyams su myong ba'i 'phrul tshig rna brgyud kyi man ngag byin pas rna bar gzhug /
NK103(pe)002:270: snod med la rgya rtags gdab pa'i cho ga bya
NK103(pe)002:271: ste rgya ral ba'i nyes dmigs rgyud las gsungs so
NK103(pe)002:272: // tshogs brgyad rang grol rang byung ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor der //
NK103(pe)002:273: brda don bral ba yul med rang gsal rtogs pa don gyi snying po blang //
NK103(pe)002:274: de nyid gdod nas gnas pas da gzod 'byung 'jug med do //
NK103(pe)002:275: dal de dag gi don bdun du nges par mjug bsdu bar bya ba yang //
NK103(pe)002:276: gshis sam gnas lugs rang byung ye shes yin te //
NK103(pe)002:277: rang 'od kyi rnam pa sgyu mas bdag gzhan gyi
NK103(pe)002:278: don rdzogs te rol pa cir yang mi 'gag pa'i
NK103(pe)002:279: rgyan // rang bzhin stong nyid dngos po'i mtha' dang
NK103(pe)002:280: bral te mu bzhi'i spros pa rang grol ba'i rgyan
NK103(pe)002:281: rgyan // // gong ma de gnyis mkhyen pa'i mtshan
NK103(pe)002:282: nyid rang gsal mu matha'i skyon las grol ba ni
NK103(pe)002:283: rgyan // // // ye nas kun la rdzogs pa gzhi yi dkyil 'khor yin no //
NK103(pe)002:284: rang snang yin pas yul na mi gnas shing rtogs pa'i rkyen bzhi dang bral //
NK103(pe)002:285: bas ngo ma shes shing bdag gzhan du brtags pas rigs drug tu 'khrul zhing 'khor bas rgyud bcings //
NK103(pe)002:286: sems can tshad las 'das pas dus rgyun du mi stongs par 'khor //
NK103(pe)002:287: ba ni thugs rje sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor yin no //
NK103(pe)002:288: lhun gnas bde chen ni rgyu'i rkyen dang bzhi rdzogs kyi bshes gnyen ni bdag po'i rkyen //
NK103(pe)002:289: sems skye ba gong 'og gi rim pas phyi ma
NK103(pe)002:290: phyi ma'i go phye ba ni de ma thag rkyen
NK103(pe)002:291: ste // bya bral rdzogs pa'i lung ni dmigs pa'i rkyen yin pas rkyen bzhis don rig pa ni //
NK103(pe)002:292: 'brel pa thabs kyi dkyil 'khor yin no //
NK103(pe)002:293: thos pa'i pradz+ny+aasa dang po ming du thos nas tshig tu bzung //
NK103(pe)002:294: bsam pa'i shes rab kyis don spyi'i rnam pa tsam go nas //
NK103(pe)002:295: bsgom pa'i shes rab kyis rig pa'i steng du khyel ba las //
NK103(pe)002:296: mthar phyin te yang rab mthong ba'i chos las grol ba ni rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor yin no //
NK103(pe)002:297: cig car ba de ltar min te blo gros zhan na //
NK103(pe)002:298: dang po gnas pa goms pa las mi g.yo ba de las mnyam par nyid kyi nyams su sbyar //
NK103(pe)002:299: de nas ye shes lhun gyis grub par gnas par goms par byed pa ni //
NK103(pe)002:300: bsam gtan goms pa'i dkyil 'khor yin no //
NK103(pe)002:301: don de lta bu'i ngang la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
NK103(pe)002:302: ma bcos pa'i ngang du goms pas gnas pa nam mkha' rdo rje'i spyod pa dang //
NK103(pe)002:303: mthun 'jug lhag pa'i spyod pas 'gro 'dul thugs rje'i spyod pa cir yang rol pa ni //
NK103(pe)002:304: rol pas spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub pa yin no //
NK103(pe)002:305: don de nyid klong du gyur cing bskyed du byar med par mthar phyin pas //
NK103(pe)002:306: rang grol nas rtsol ba med par 'gro ba sgrol //
NK103(pe)002:307: bstan pa'i chos byin gyis rlabs las nyi ma ltar gdal //
NK103(pe)002:308: ba ni theg pa kun gyi 'bras bu kun rdzogs pa bde chen gyi dkyil 'khor yin no //
NK103(pe)002:309: nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud che po //
NK103(pe)002:310: brjod bya klong dgu rjod byed bam po nyi khri nas dang //
NK103(pe)002:311: dkyil 'khor kun nas don bsdus nas //
NK103(pe)002:312: 'jam dbyangs byin brlabs bu la gtad //
NK103(pe)002:313: chos thams cad dkyil 'khor du lung bstan pa zhes bya ba /
NK103(pe)002:314: slob dpon dga' rab rdo rjes mdzad pa /
NK103(pe)002:315: rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh+r+ai sing+ha pra ba ta dang /
NK103(pe)002:316: bod kyi lo ts+aa ba dge slong bee ro tsa nas /
NK103(pe)002:317: yul d+ha he na'i 'du khang du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
